name: General Human Skills
description: Core human skills applicable to various career paths

items.name: Focus
items.description: Ability to concentrate and avoid distractions

items.name: Intelligence
items.description: General ability to learn and solve problems

items.name: Communication
items.description: Clarity in expressing ideas verbally and in writing

items.name: Creativity
items.description: Novel thinking and imaginative problem-solving

items.name: Discipline
items.description: Self-control and structured approach to tasks

items.name: Charisma
items.description: Personal magnetism and ability to influence others

items.name: Patience
items.description: Ability to remain calm and persist through difficulties

items.name: Adaptability
items.description: Adjusting to new situations and requirements

items.name: Confidence
items.description: Self-assurance and belief in one's abilities

items.name: Observation
items.description: Noticing details in surroundings and situations

items.name: Critical Thinking
items.description: Evaluating information objectively

items.name: Empathy
items.description: Understanding others' emotions and perspectives

items.name: Memory
items.description: Retention and recall of information

items.name: Persuasion
items.description: Ability to convince others and change minds

items.name: Organization
items.description: Managing time, resources, and information

name: Professional Skills
description: Specialized skills related to specific career tracks

items.name: Business Acumen
items.description: Understanding markets, strategy, and organizational dynamics

items.name: Spatial Awareness
items.description: Understanding geographic locations and relationships

items.name: Coding
items.description: Programming and software development capabilities

items.name: Data Analysis
items.description: Processing and interpreting complex data sets

items.name: Mathematical Reasoning
items.description: Advanced mathematical and logical thinking

items.name: Media Production
items.description: Creating engaging visual and audio content

items.name: Marketing
items.description: Creating and targeting messages to specific audiences

items.name: Mystical Knowledge
items.description: Understanding of occult concepts and magical systems

items.name: Networking
items.description: Building and maintaining beneficial relationships

items.name: Research
items.description: Systematic investigation to establish facts
